CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y git                        wget &&     wget http://packages.erlang-solutions.com/erlang-solutions_1.0_all.deb &&     dpkg -i erlang-solutions_1.0_all.deb &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y esl-erlang=1:17.5.3 &&     apt-get autoremove -y --purge &&     apt-get clean &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* &&     rm -rf erlang-solutions_1.0_all.deb &&     git clone https://github.com/studzien/erlang-ansible-rpc.git
Commands.Name: run
